name: Chima
headline: Building infrastructure tools to help large companies customize theirâ¦
description: Companies struggle to customize their generative AI models by taking advantage of their existing customer and enterprise data, in real-time. Chima solves for this through a sleek, interoperable layer before the standard generative AI models are applied.
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Nikhara Nirghin, Founder
founders.description: Nikhara Nirghin is co-founder and CEO at Chima. She started Chima with Kiara, her sister after working at both Goldman Sachs and Deloitte Consulting and understanding the difficulties of activating enterprise data with AI. Nikhara earned her MBA at London Business School and did her undergrad and postgrad in Mathematical Statistics and Actuarial Science. Awards: International best paper on stochastic data modeling by the Reinsurance Group of America. Email: nikhara@withchima.com.

founders.name: Kiara Nirghin, Founder
founders.description: Kiara Nirghin is co-founder and CTO at Chima. She started Chima based on her experience of the importance in building robust, smarter ways of bringing raw business data to generative AI models. She both studied and taught at Stanford (CS / AI) and is a Thiel Fellow. Kiara won the International Google Science Grand Prize with her data first approach to algorithms and predictive modeling. She worked at Meta and Google. Awards: Time Magazine's Most Influential people.

# The Intelligent Enterprise.
### AI Agents built to transform entire systems with Human Reasoning
[Login](https://www.withchima.com/<http:/sid.withchima.com/>)[Contact Sales![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/67692244671ff80c09799d15_Arrow%20Black%20Strait.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676922446caf6de807a3f2a6_Arrow%20White%20Strait.svg)](https://www.withchima.com/</contact>)
![Pause video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628299f8aa233b83918e24fd_Pause.svg)![Play video](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6022af993a6b2191db3ed10c/628298b20ae0236682d4b87f_Play-24.svg)
#### 1. Easy Integration
Run complex human reasoning agents across Operations, Marketing, Support, and Compliance with custom integrations.
#### 2. Monitor Baseline Metrics
We set a benchmark for process efficiency, time, and business outcomes, providing clear performance insights.
#### 3. An End-to-end Focus
We fully automate the identified tasks, using intelligent AI systems, streamlining operations for increased efficiency and speed.
#### 4. Optimization & Compliance
Our systems improve in real-time while ensuring compliance with regulations, security standards, and internal policies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676c344da72b86decc89fbf0_Gust.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/6770f47a796275bf61d998b1_M%C3%A1s%2B%20Lockup%20White%20Horizontal%20CMYK.png)

#### Total hours saved
600-700K HourS
#### Generative AI-driven, end-to-end functions
4-5X FASTER
#### Key results driven in every Enterprise system
We've generated over $40M in profit with our AI deployments. Hire our generative AI agents to transform your marketing, customer support, sales, operations, compliance, security, and more.
## Chima is building the future of Enterprise AGI.
We are pioneering the Compound Human Reasoning system to perform any workflow, role or function for your business.

### Compound Human Reasoning for end-to-end Enterprise functions
### Compound Human Reasoning for end-to-end Enterprise functions
## Chima is the most secure AI platform
Chima continuously prioritizes tight data privacy and security standards for each of the customers we serve and are audited to uphold and exceed these standards.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676ebe28a2d4cca67ba1d95a_Industry%20Grade%20Security%20White.svg)
### Industry-grade Security and Compliance
Chima uses state-of-the-art security protocols to protect your IP and enterprise data.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676f0ea5058ff5f9a4f24b09_SOC%20Green-1%20White%20Color.svg)
### SOC 2
Chima is SOC 2 Type 2, third-party audited and certified. Through this we ensure security, availability, and confidentiality of our platform for our customers.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676f0e6826faba4ab3f560e3_ISO%20Green-1%20White.svg)
### ISO 27001
Chima is certified and audited under ISO 27001, maintaining robust information security management systems.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676f0e68deedf2880373c1c2_HIPAA%20LOGO%20Green-1White%20.svg)
### HIPAA
Chima is HIPAA compliant, providing secure management of sensitive personal and healthcare information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676f0e68ad7f4e1e693c4493_CPPPAAA%20Green-1%20White.svg)
### CCPA
As a San Francisco-based company, Chima adheres to CCPA guidelines, ensuring the privacy and protection of personal information for California residents.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/676f0e686883f1e67f8733d3_GDPR%20Green-1%20White.svg)
### GDPR
Serving various European companies, Chima complies with GDPR regulations, protecting personal data and privacy rights.
## Bring AI Agents to your Enterprise.
Our proprietary systems lead in customizability, speed of deployment, and cost efficiency. We drive the highest KPIs and business value for our enterprises.
#### Agentic System
We build the industry's leading AI systems, purpose-built for the Enterprise, enabling the quick and accurate automation of workflows of any complexity. From manual tasks to multi-step processes, we lead with advanced models to handle it all.
#### Specialized Use Cases
Once integrated end-to-end, our Human Reasoning Systems are deployed across business functions like marketing, customer support, sales, operations, compliance, security and beyond.
#### Custom Interfaces
We deploy our systems’ capabilities in custom enterprise interfaces, built and intelligently refined with each interaction. We go beyond chat interfaces with embedded workflows.
## Our Success Stories
Explore our success stories, highlighting innovative designs and impactful solutions tailored to client needs. From overcoming challenges to achieving remarkable results, these stories showcase our dedication to creating meaningful experiences and driving growth for businesses across industries.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6768ea2356c25a3a9939e95a/6769729ca7fffeda5f048cd2_Vector.svg)

generated_description:
Let's talk about Chima, a fascinating player in the generative AI space that’s not standing still. Founded in 2022 and nestled in the heart of San Francisco, Chima’s mission is clear: to build infrastructure tools that enable large companies to effectively customize their generative AI models by leveraging their existing customer and enterprise data in real-time.

The challenge companies face in customizing their AI models is significant. That's where Chima steps in, providing a sleek, interoperable layer that sits before standard generative AI models are applied. This not only simplifies the integration process but also enhances efficiency across various business operations. With just a tiny team of seven, including notable backing from Y Combinator—specifically from Group Partner Michael Seibel—Chima is punching well above its weight.

So, what exactly is Chima up to? They've developed an impressive array of products designed to transform entire systems through what they call "Compound Human Reasoning." This innovative approach allows enterprises to automate processes across operations, marketing, support, and compliance, among others. By implementing these intelligent AI systems, Chima boasts some staggering stats: they've saved between 600 to 700,000 hours in labor and helped generate over $40 million in profit across their customer deployments.

Their platform is built for security, adhering to stringent standards including SOC 2, ISO 27001, HIPAA, and GDPR compliance, ensuring that client data is well-protected. They're not just tall claims; these protocols are what you’d expect from a startup founded in the well-regarded cradle of innovation that is San Francisco.

Chima’s offerings range from *Sid*, *Chi Core*, and *Chi Nexus* to *Frontier*, each tailored to optimize different aspects of enterprise functionalities. They pride themselves on easy integration and real-time optimization—two critical efficiency drivers in today’s rapidly changing business environment. 

If you want to dive deeper, you can check out their [website](https://www.withchima.com/) for resources like case studies, a blog, and even career opportunities. Chima is on a solid trajectory, building the future of enterprise AGI and making waves with their unique approach to transforming business processes with generative AI. It's an exciting time to watch them grow and redefine what's possible in enterprise automation!
